Name: Toppletiff Holdings..
Description: An Import/Export company, smaller than it thinks but bigger than it should be. Magnus Toppletiff and family run a shady fencing operation, skirting the line between respectability and piracy. Lately his errant son has becoming something of a nuisance issuing challages to duel over the silliest of reasons - Training he calls it.
ReputationStatements: I'm his Father and I say you should let him win.
Don't be a fool and ignore me.
Mercenary trash, but ok at least I don't have to get my 'Mechs dirty.
I'll see you ruined if you make a fool of my Family. You'll see that life can be made difficult for you otherwise.
If it's payment you want, then deliver as per the contract.
If it's payment you want, then deliver as per the contract..
If it's payment you want, then deliver as per the contract...
MissionSuccessStatements: For someone with your street cred, I expected better things. That was a total balls up, Commander— and I'll be sure to tell everyone I know not to count on you in the future.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: For someone with your street cred, I expected better things. That was a total balls up, Commander— and I'll be sure to tell everyone I know not to count on you in the future.
